message.entry: Negative frequencies are ignored in this function.
The signal has zero variance.
You cannot specify OFAC when frequency vector is specified.
The function operates only on positive frequencies.
Probability of Detection is not available when frequency vector is specified.
Probability of Detection is only available for single channel input.

The time vector (T) should be in increasing order.

The function only supports multidimensional arrays in 2D format.
The signal (X) and time vector (T) should have same lengths.
Time vector (T) provided must be numeric.
Oversampling-Factor (OFAC) should be numeric.

{0} is an invalid input.
